snippet: Goaltender Martin Brodeur, 40, signed a contract worth $9 million that more than likely will allow him to finish his career in New Jersey.
abstract: Goalie Martin Brodeur re-signs with the New Jersey Devils for two years after turning down offers from other teams.
lead_paragraph: Goaltender Martin Brodeur, 40, signed a contract worth $9 million that more than likely will allow him to finish his career in New Jersey.

headline.seo: Brodeur Returns to Devils With Two-Year Deal
headline.main: Brodeur Signs Two-Year Deal With Devils
headline.print_headline: Brodeur Signs Two-Year Deal With Devils
